00067 INT MDQ_IslandRate_init()
00068 {
00069     // See if the DataQuality_LowLevel/ directory already exists
00070   if (!gDirectory->Cd("DataQuality_LowLevel")) {
00071     
00072     std::string dir_name("DataQuality_LowLevel/");
00073     gDirectory->mkdir(dir_name.c_str());
00074     gDirectory->Cd(dir_name.c_str());
00075   }
00076 
00077   // hDQ_IslandRate
00078   std::string histname = "hDQ_IslandRate";
00079   std::string histtitle = "The total island rate in each channel";
00080   hDQ_IslandRate = new TH1F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 1,0,1);
00081   hDQ_IslandRate->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Detector (Bank)");
00082   hDQ_IslandRate->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Island Rate [TPI per second]");
00083   hDQ_IslandRate->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00084 
00085   // The normalised histogram
00086   histname += "_normalised";
00087   histtitle += " (normalised)";
00088   hDQ_IslandRate_normalised = new TH1F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 1,0,1);
00089   hDQ_IslandRate_normalised->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Detector (Bank)");
00090   std::string yaxislabel = hDQ_IslandRate->GetYaxis()->GetTitle();
00091   yaxislabel += " per TDC muSc Hit";
00092   hDQ_IslandRate_normalised->GetYaxis()->SetTitle(yaxislabel.c_str());
00093 
00094 
00095   gDirectory->Cd("/MidasHists/");
00096   return SUCCESS;
00097 }
00098 
00101 INT MDQ_IslandRate_eor(INT run_number) {
00102 
00103   // Get the run duration to scale the histogram
00104   HNDLE hDB, hKey;
00105   char keyName[200];
00106 
00107   if(cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL) != CM_SUCCESS){
00108     printf("Warning: Could not connect to ODB database!\n");
00109     return false;
00110   }
00111 
00112   sprintf(keyName, "/Runinfo/Start time binary");
00113   if(db_find_key(hDB,0,keyName, &hKey) != SUCCESS){
00114     printf("Warning: Could not find key %s\n", keyName);
00115     return false;
00116   }
00117   KEY start_time_key;
00118   if(db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &start_time_key) != DB_SUCCESS){
00119     printf("Warning: Could not find key %s\n", keyName);
00120     return false;
00121   }
00122   DWORD StartTimes[start_time_key.num_values];
00123   int size = sizeof(StartTimes);
00124   if(db_get_value(hDB, 0, keyName, StartTimes, &size, TID_DWORD, 0) != DB_SUCCESS){
00125     printf("Warning: Could not retrieve values for key %s\n", keyName);
00126     return false;
00127   }
00128 
00129   sprintf(keyName, "/Runinfo/Stop time binary");
00130   if(db_find_key(hDB,0,keyName, &hKey) != SUCCESS){
00131     printf("Warning: Could not find key %s\n", keyName);
00132     return false;
00133   }
00134   KEY stop_time_key;
00135   if(db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &stop_time_key) != DB_SUCCESS){
00136     printf("Warning: Could not find key %s\n", keyName);
00137     return false;
00138   }
00139   DWORD StopTimes[stop_time_key.num_values];
00140   size = sizeof(StopTimes);
00141   if(db_get_value(hDB, 0, keyName, StopTimes, &size, TID_DWORD, 0) != DB_SUCCESS){
00142     printf("Warning: Could not retrieve values for key %s\n", keyName);
00143     return false;
00144   }
00145 
00146   int duration = StopTimes[0] - StartTimes[0]; // length of run in seconds (checked against run #2600)
00147 
00148   hDQ_IslandRate->Scale(1.0/duration);
00149   hDQ_IslandRate_normalised->Scale(1.0/duration);
00150 
00151   hDQ_IslandRate_normalised->Scale(1.0/hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc->GetEntries()); // also normalise to the number of muSc hits in the TDC
00152 
00153   return SUCCESS;
00154 }
00155 
00158 INT MDQ_IslandRate(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00159 {
00160         // Get the event number
00161         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00162 
00163         // Some typedefs
00164         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00165         typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00166         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00167 
00168         // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00169         // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00170         TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00171                 gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00172 
00173         // Loop over the map and get each bankname, vector pair
00174         for (map_iterator mapIter = pulse_islands_map.begin(); mapIter != pulse_islands_map.end(); ++mapIter) 
00175         {
00176           std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00177           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> thePulses = mapIter->second;
00178           std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00179 
00180           std::string binname = detname + "(" + bankname + ")";
00181 
00182           hDQ_IslandRate->Fill(binname.c_str(), thePulses.size()); // keep a count of the total number of TPIs
00183           hDQ_IslandRate_normalised->Fill(binname.c_str(), thePulses.size()); // keep a count of the total number of TPIs
00184         }
00185         return SUCCESS;
00186 }
